data.name: The Iron Giant
data.desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
data.stars: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston, Vin Diesel

data.name: Boogie Nights
data.desc: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
data.stars: Mark Wahlberg, Julianne Moore, Burt Reynolds, Luis Guzmán
